mapper.select: select tb.type_name as typeName, tc.user_name as createByer, td.user_name as updateByer, te.user_name as checkByer, ta.type_id as typeId,ta.dict_id as dictId,ta.dict_name as dictName,ta.dict_short_name as dictShortName, ta.dict_full_name as dictFullName,ta.create_by as createBy,ta.create_at as createAt, ta.update_by as updateBy,ta.update_at as updateAt,ta.flag,ta.check_by as checkBy, ta.check_at as checkAt,ta.is_used as isUsed,ta.memo,ta.pycode,ta.data_version as dataVersion from twei_dict ta left join twei_dict_type tb on ta.type_id = tb.type_id left join twei_user tc on ta.create_By = tc.userid left join twei_user td on ta.update_By = td.userid left join twei_user te on ta.check_By = te.userid where ta.type_id = #{type_id} Order by ta.dict_id
